title: Timeless Polki Diamond Drop Earrings - A Hyderabadi Heirloom
materials: Enhanced with meticulous setting by Hyderabadi artisans. Features the iconic Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting brilliance and shine.
features: Crafted in a classic drop design, these earrings feature three graduated sections: a round polki diamond halo, leading to a smaller connecting diamond and finishing with a teardrop-shaped Polki. The intricate setting showcases each diamond’s natural beauty, creating a mesmerizing play of light. Each diamond is delicately set by our finest artisans, emphasizing the unique nature of the diamond.
colors: Predominantly gold with the translucent sparkle of Polki diamonds
occasions: and festive celebrations. Also suitable for adding a touch of regal elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: A timeless piece that embodies the rich heritage of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. Polki diamonds, known for their uncut, natural beauty, hold a special place in South Indian jewelry traditions. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting brilliance and adds an element of prestige. Owning this exquisite piece means owning a slice of history and an item sure to become a family heirloom.
